str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
To be faint, be weary. From ek and kakos; to be weak, i.e. to fail.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation. From thlibo; pressure.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
